name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yor Forger in Spy X Family Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the thrilling dual life of Yor Forger, the charming yet deadly Thorn Princess, with this captivating live wallpaper! 💃✨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser with Yor Forger, the iconic assassin from Spy X Family, who balances her secret missions with her role as a devoted wife and mother. This live wallpaper captures her elegance, strength, and undeniable allure, making it a perfect addition for fans of action-packed anime with heartwarming family dynamics. Every new tab immerses you in Yor's world, showcasing her poised readiness for action and unwavering dedication to protecting her loved ones.

Ideal for fans who admire Yor's graceful power and complexity, this wallpaper is a must-have for anime enthusiasts seeking to personalize their browsing experience.

Key Features
🗡️ Live Wallpaper of Yor Forger: A striking design highlighting Yor’s fierce and graceful assassin persona.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Conveniently search the web with Yor’s captivating image in the background.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stay organized with an elegant clock and date feature.
🔗 Customizable Shortcuts: Add or remove quick-access links to your favorite websites.
🔗 Extension Management: Easily manage your extensions with the “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” links in the lower-left corner.
Showcase your love for Spy X Family with the Yor Forger in Spy X Family Live Wallpaper. Elevate your browser with the perfect blend of action, style, and family charm!
